```{r}
library(pixiedust)
fit <- lm(mpg ~ qsec + factor(am) + wt * factor(gear), data = mtcars)
x <- dust(fit, glance_foot = TRUE) %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 2:4, halign = "center") %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 5, fn = quote(pvalString(value))) %>%
  sprinkle(round = 3) %>%
  sprinkle(cols = c(2, 4, 5), border = c("bottom", "top"), border_style = "dashed", border_color = "Blue") %>%
  sprinkle(cols = c(2, 4), rows = 3:5, border = "right", border_style = "double") %>%
  sprinkle(bg_pattern_by = "rows") %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("latex")
```

```{r}
x
```

```{r}
dust(anova(fit)) %>%
  sprinkle(round = 3, na_string = "N/A") %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("latex")
```
